name: css-animation-directions
description: Css module of single purpose classes for animation directions

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-animation-directions.css > css/css-animation-directions.css && tachyons src/css-animation-directions.css --minify > css/css-animation-directions.min.css && tachyons src/css-animation-directions.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
